thread.title: Wonderful property and staff
thread.title_full: Wonderful property and staff - Review of Renaissance Paris Arc de Triomphe Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Darien H
title: Wonderful property and staff
text:
I cannot say enough how much my wife and I enjoyed our stay at this hotel for 5 nights. The staff were all extremely friendly and helpful, going so far as to give us a bigger room because we needed a crib for our one-year old daughter with us. I also mentioned that we were in town for our 5 year anniversary and they offered us a free glass of champagne and a "love lock" to place on the big "R" outside the front door. Those were just extra special touches that made this visit so special.
The location is excellent, extremely close the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysees. Plus, it's just a short walk to two metro stations. It was nice to be on an authentic Parisian street, just a little bit away from the madness of the CE. We loved the hotel, its design, and its location, but the staff really made our stay special. Even with a baby, they made us feel very valued and welcome. Would love to stay there again.
